mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AT_CST_VISIT( CP_CODE, CN_IDENTIFER, CN_CUSTOMER, CN_TYPE, CN_CONTACT, CN_TIME, CN_CONTENT, CN_RESULT, OPERATOR, REMARK ) VALUES( #{cpCode}, #{cnIdentifer}, #{cnCustomer}, #{cnType}, #{cnContact}, #{cnTime}, #{cnContent}, #{cnResult}, #{operator}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, CN_IDENTIFER as cnIdentifer, CN_CUSTOMER as cnCustomer, CN_TYPE as cnType, CN_CONTACT as cnContact, CN_TIME as cnTime, CN_CONTENT as cnContent, CN_RESULT as cnResult, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_CST_VISIT c WHERE c.ID=#{id}

SELECT c.ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, CN_IDENTIFER as cnIdentifer, CN_CUSTOMER as cnCustomer, CN_TYPE as cnType, CN_CONTACT as cnContact, CN_TIME as cnTime, CN_CONTENT as cnContent, CN_RESULT as cnResult, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_CST_VISIT c ORDER BY createTime
